ProductInfo.Features:
Bright 47-in 1,920 x 1080 Full-HD LCD display for improved outdoor viewing
Direct sunlight-readable 700 NIT LCD screen provides a clear picture in the brightest conditions
High temperature Extended Solar Tolerance (EST) technology prevents isotropic blackout
Front tempered anti-reflective glass window provides added protection to screen while safegaurding against vandalism and abuse
Powder-coated aluminum housing protects internal components from weathering effects such as rain, humidity and dust
ProductInfo.Name: Factory-Reconditioned SunBriteTV DS-4707ESTL-SLR Marquee Series 47 in. 1080p 60 Hz LCD Full-HD True Outdoor All-Weather Horizontal Digital Signage Display (Silver)
